message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.NE 

The paper presents a method for automated segmentation of the myocardium in MRI volumes using neural networks, which falls under the computer vision (cs.CV) and machine learning (cs.LG) sub-categories. The use of an original loss function suggests a focus on artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The method also involves image synthesis, which could be categorized under multimedia (cs.MM). Finally, the use of neural networks for segmentation suggests a possible connection to neural networks (cs.NE).
